get R color alpha value

Source: R/jamba-colors.r
col2alpha.Rd

Return the alpha transparency per R color

col2alpha(x, maxValue = 1, ...)

Arguments

x

R compatible color, either a color name, or hex value, or a mixture of the two. Any value compatible with col2rgb.

maxValue

numeric maximum value to return, useful when the downstream alpha range should be 255. By default maxValue=1 is returned.

See also

Other jam color functions: alpha2col(), applyCLrange(), col2hcl(), col2hsl(), col2hsv(), color2gradient(), fixYellowHue(), fixYellow(), getColorRamp(), hcl2col(), hsl2col(), hsv2col(), isColor(), kable_coloring(), makeColorDarker(), make_html_styles(), make_styles(), rgb2col(), setCLranges(), setTextContrastColor(), showColors(), unalpha(), warpRamp()
